Articles.Content:
Welcome to the Strato-launch challenge!

Your goal is to build a launch system similar to stratolaunch!

Rules:

Rocket must separate from a carrier aircraft from 10,000 meters or higher.

The carrier aircraft can only have 1 stage and must be powered by jet engines.

The rocket must be able to put a 13 ton or more payload into low kerbin orbit.

Rocket can only use rocket or ion engines.

Rocket CAN use wings.

Extra challenges:

Reusable rocket

Reach mun, minmus or even other planets.

Reach kerbin escape.

Submission form:

Imgur album, pictures or video.

Edited June 27, 2014 by Kinglet
This is an interesting challenge. Reserved for entry.
this looks fun. will definatley try it
